name: Mine Or Die (Ryan)
description:
You've been trapped by a cave-in! Gather resources, craft tools to survive, and build a teleporter to escape!

Note: Sorry there isn't a Mac version. The voxel tools are a native component, and I don't have a mac to compile on.

Control:

  • Left Mouse: Fire
  • Right Mouse: Mine
  • E: Inventory

# Credits

- [Godot Voxel Tools](https://github.com/Zylann/godot_voxel) plugin by Zylann
